lyrics:
5 contributorsfeeling alright lyricsintro
were feelin alright yeah
were feelin good were feelin alright
yeah yeah yeah

verse 1
well its about that time for us
to look around and meet somebody new
lets all welcome in
familiar faces perhaps somebody who
has got a conflict in their life alright
tell them youre sorry but
theres ways to change the wrong to right

prechorus
see we can sit in a distant haze
and watch rain clouds pour thoughts of greatness
to help our troubles sail real far away oh yeah
well its a struggle every day were stressin
but whats a life without dedication ah
im gonna pick up that souls intention
to soak in music relaxation

chorus
were feelin good were feelin alright yeah
were feelin good were feelin alright yeah
were feelin good were feelin alright yeah
were feelin good were feelin alright
yeah yeah yeah
see rebelution liveget tickets as low as 115you might also likeverse 2
in a moment ill be on my way
to better days while life is changing
and even though ive had my share of pain
ive been sympathisin and realisin
ive got a feeling we could be a better friend
simply complimenting every now and then
cause in the morning i wake up and miss the night before
cause i love the music more and more

and watch rain clouds pour thoughts of greatness
to help our troubles sail real far away oh yeah

but whats a life without dedication ah
